property_title: Single-Storey Pool Villa in Central Pattaya ‚Äì Near Pattaya Beach, Fully Furnished
property_description:
‚ú® A luxurious single-storey house located in the heart of Pattaya, in the prime location of “Chaloem Phrakiat Soi 10/1.” Close to tourist attractions, restaurants, and leading shopping malls. Only 10 minutes to Pattaya Beach. The house is fully decorated and ready to move in, featuring a private saltwater overflow swimming pool, complete furniture, and full electrical appliances. Perfect for living or long-term rental investment.

Property Details
Land Area: 54 sq. wah (216 sq.m.)
Single-storey house with private saltwater overflow swimming pool
3 Bedrooms / 4 Bathrooms
Parking for 2 cars inside the house
Automatic gate + 5 CCTV cameras
Outdoor shower and garden area around the house

Price and Conditions
Selling Price: 12.9 million baht
Freehold : Thai name – Ready to transfer
Transfer fee: 50/50 (buyer and seller share equally)

Interior and Equipment
European-style kitchen
Equipped with 4-burner electric stove / 2-door refrigerator / built-in oven and microwave / counter with wine storage
Beds: 6 ft (2 rooms) and 5 ft (1 room)
Fully furnished in every room with TVs in all rooms
Air conditioning in all rooms, built-in wardrobes
Water pump + 2,000-liter water tank

Location Highlights
Location: Chaloem Phrakiat Soi 10/1, in the heart of Pattaya. Convenient access with multiple routes, close to shopping areas and the beach.
650 m → Big C Extra Central Pattaya
1.3 km → Sukhumvit Road
1.4 km → Pattaya Night Bazaar
2 km → Pattaya Beach
2.3 km → Central Pattaya

property_title: Pool Villa in Huay Yai  ‚Äì 3 Houses on a Large 600 sq.wah, Main Road Frontage
property_description:
‚ú® Prime-location pool villa in “Huay Yai – Tessaban 1 Soi 17.” The property is located right on the main road, offering easy access to Jomtien Beach and downtown Pattaya.
Set on a spacious 1 Rai 2 Ngan (600 sq.wah) plot, featuring a total of 3 houses (2 Nordic-style houses and 1 two-storey Modern Bali-style house),
including 6 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms, a private swimming pool, fully furnished, and currently rented out for 90,000 THB/month.
Perfect for both residential living and long-term investment.

Property Details
Land size: 1 Rai 2 Ngan (600 sq.wah)
2 title deeds (Title deed 1 faces the main road, title deed 2 is located behind)
Total: 6 bedrooms / 7 bathrooms
Parking for more than 10 cars
Automatic filtration swimming pool (salt and chlorine systems)
Public drainage connection
5-meter-high fence with electric gate
Fully furnished, ready to move in

üè† House Details
-Nordic House No.1
Size: 10 m (width) × 6 m (depth)
2 bedrooms / 2 bathrooms / 1 living room

-Modern Bali House No.2 (2 storeys)
Size: 12 m (width) × 4 m (depth)
2 bedrooms / 3 bathrooms / 1 hall / 1 kitchen
Private swimming pool (3×6 meters)

-Nordic House No.3
Size: 10 m (width) × 6 m (depth)
2 bedrooms / 2 bathrooms / 1 living room

Price and Sale Conditions
Selling Price: 19.5 Million THB
Ownership: Thai name ( Freehold )
Transfer fee: 50/50 (buyer & seller)
Status: Currently rented out for 90,000 THB/month

Included Items
6 air conditioners (13,000 BTU each), 1 four-way air conditioner (25,000 BTU)
8 water heaters (3,500W), 1 washing machine
2 high-pressure water pumps, 4 water tanks (2,000 liters each)
3-phase electrical system for energy saving
Construction permit available and legally approved

Location Highlights
Located in Huay Yai area, Pattaya – peaceful surroundings with convenient access to main attractions and amenities.
2.4 km → Huay Chak Nok Reservoir
3.5 km → Pattaya City Park
5.4 km → Pattaya Floating Market
7.7 km → Jomtien Beach
10.7 km → Pattaya City
